item.title: Who I am
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: —Hello, My name is Jérémy Levron. I’m an enthusiastic creative front-end developer currently working at Poignée de main virile, a France-based design studio and award winning. I like to discover and learning things every day, to be part, maybe one day, of what we call "cool kids". I'm not a kid anymore, but hey, I'm still pretty cool. 😎 You can reach me at levronjeremy[at]19h47.fr to grab a beer or talk about JavaScript.   Thank you so much to Julien Vasseur for all the things he has taught me, it’s incredible. 💥 This website is created with WordPress, Timber, Barba.js. Typeface is Work Sans.

item.title: What I do
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Thank you so much to Julien Vasseur for all the things he has taught me, it's incredible. 💥 This website is created with WordPress, Timber, Barba.js. Typeface is Work Sans.

item.title: Équipe de basketball amateur
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: A fake association want a real website. So, here I am.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The exercise was to try to highlight the fun, with strong flat colors, large pictogram, and kill the cliché of association's websites. 🏀

Typeface used is Pluto. I like working with one font and playing with vertical and horizontal rythm. I'm not a webdesigner or something, but I try to improve my skill with typography. Typography is everything.

item.title: Les 48h de l'agriculture urbaine
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Each year the parisian association La Sauge, organizes an event called Les 48h de l'agriculture urbaine. It's an event encouraging people to do gardening. This event is organized in many french's cities like Nantes, Paris, or Toulouse. The studio Les Indiens, who did the artistic direction and the webdesign, called me to develop the website.

item.title: Pick Up Production
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Pick Up Production is a Nantes cultural association created in 1999. After many years with a simple WordPress theme, the association wanted a real custom-made website.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Pick Up Production works with a lot of photographer, so the idea was to focus on large photography on the site, and with the help of some gradients and opacities, kept the readability of content.
The association works hard to improve accessibility of the events it organizes. The same idea had to be applied to the site.

When the menu is open an overlay comes over the contents, blocking the scroll.
Navigation can be done using the keyboard.
The escape key permits to close the menu to kept in mind accessibility.
Typeface used are Radikal for heading and Open Sans for body. The website is running under WordPress and Timber.
